document_data.mainbody:
Valourish, who was nicknamed the Younger, was a Calishite wizard inhabiting the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Valourish owned the Bath House, a spa located in the western section of Zhentil Keeps Foreign Quarter on Teshwave Street. He built the Bath House to help remind him of his warm southern home.
His prized possession was a djinni bottle that housed a marid under his command.
